subject: Complete your loan application
body:
Dear Homeowner

Are you still paying too much for your mortgage?. Your approval is waiting.

You can receive $262,000 for 
$602 per month.

Please respond Instantly.
http://ilook.tw/fcoa


Mauricio Donne
Ready Loan


Lots of times you have to pretend to join a parade in which you're not really interested in order to get where you're going.	-Christopher Darlington Morley (1890-1957)
